English: Attention, comrades, eyes on me! Be proud for we are going to war!
The Americans once again invaded the island of Everon, east of here.\nThe locals rose up in arms and the island is in the middle of a civil war.
As the nearest units of the Red Army\nwe are tasked with providing assistance to the local government forces and restoring them back to power.
Comrade Dostoevsky, this sounds very serious. We are not that many, shouldn't we wait for reinforcements?\nIs this like eight years ago when we...
I appreciate your concerns, comrade Morokov, but there is nothing to fear.\nThere's also no reason not to act now.
The Red Army will not stand idly by and let good people die at the hands of western aggressors.
Command already made a decision. The attack is starting in an hour.\nThe helicopters are waiting to take us to the island.
Get ready, comrades. For Mother Russia!
